name: Universal Timeline Manager
overview: Chronological playlists for cinematic universes in Jellyfin with drag-and-drop web interface.
description: Automatically creates and maintains chronological playlists for multiple cinematic universes (Marvel, DC, Star Wars, etc.) based on JSON configuration files or visual web interface. Features drag-and-drop timeline creation, Provider_ID matching with TMDB/IMDB, mixed content support (movies + TV episodes), and comprehensive error handling. No more manual JSON editing - use the intuitive web UI directly in Jellyfin!
